alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued April 17 at 5:06PM ChST until April 20 at 6:00AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... ...HIGH RISK OF RIP CURRENTS UNTIL LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the High Surf Advisory, large breaking waves of 7 to 9 feet and dangerous rip currents. * WHERE...North facing reefs of the Marianas. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Surf is expected to increase briefly along north and east facing reefs Tuesday, before dropping below hazardous levels Tuesday night.
info.instruction: Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions. Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.
